com.androidanimator.animation

Class FadeInAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androidanimator.animation.Animation
      • com.androidanimator.animation.FadeInAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combinable

    public class FadeInAnimation
extends Animation
implements Combinable
    This animation fades the view in by animating its alpha property from 0 to 1.
    Author:
    SiYao
